column3: @glaksmono Thanks for wanting to work on #12697. For future reference, ideally [WIP] PRs should only be opened when some code has been written, and you need help/feedback in regards to code or design decisions. We don't really use them for "claiming" issues to work on, a comment in the relevant issue is enough for that. (they will also consume Travis resources unnecessarily).
Got it @fanquake apologise. Will keep that in mind for the future.
